alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Dougherty (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 14 at 2:07PM EDT until June 14 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Western Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 207 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Morgan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Morgan around 215 PM EDT. Leary around 225 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Commissary Hill, Turman, Red Store Crossroads, Walker, Bermuda, Holt and Ducker. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
